entry.title: Natas 4
entry.content:
Username: natas4
URL:      http://natas4.natas.labs.overthewire.org

This challenge tells us the following information: Access disallowed. You are visiting from "" while authorized users should come only from "http://natas5.natas.labs.overthewire.org/

So it seems like the application checks the referer of the request. This can easily be bypassed by using some sort of web proxy, such as Burp, and adding the following line in the GET request header:

Referer: http://natas5.natas.labs.overthewire.org/

And the page returns the password for the next stage:

Access granted. The password for natas5 is iX6IOfmpN7AYOQGPwtn3fXpbaJVJcHfq

Password: iX6IOfmpN7AYOQGPwtn3fXpbaJVJcHfq

entry.title: Natas 3
entry.content:
Username: natas3
URL:      http://natas3.natas.labs.overthewire.org

This challenge again greets us by saying that there is nothing on the page. There is no right-click restriction so we can easily see the source code of the page. This time, in the source code, there is nothing peculiar about the page. However, navigating to http://natas3.natas.labs.overthewire.org/robots.txt, we can see there is a hidden directory called /s3cr3t/.

User-agent: *
Disallow: /s3cr3t/

Navigating to this directory, we see a listing of all the files, including users.txt. The contents of this file are listed below.

natas4:Z9tkRkWmpt9Qr7XrR5jWRkgOU901swEZ

Password: Z9tkRkWmpt9Qr7XrR5jWRkgOU901swEZ

entry.title: Natas 2
entry.content:
Username: natas2
URL:      http://natas2.natas.labs.overthewire.org

This challenge greets us by saying that there is nothing on the page. Looking at the source, this is infact true. However, there is a random image found in the source code of the page that points to http://natas2.natas.labs.overthewire.org/files/pixel.png.

If we try to see the index of the /files/ directory, we see a users.txt file containing the following:

# username:password
alice:BYNdCesZqW
bob:jw2ueICLvT
charlie:G5vCxkVV3m
natas3:sJIJNW6ucpu6HPZ1ZAchaDtwd7oGrD14
eve:zo4mJWyNj2
mallory:9urtcpzBmH

Password: sJIJNW6ucpu6HPZ1ZAchaDtwd7oGrD14

entry.title: Natas 1
entry.content:
Username: natas1
URL: http://natas1.natas.labs.overthewire.org

This challenge was similar to natas 0. However, they added some javascript to prevent us from right-clicking on the page and viewing the source. There are plenty of ways to solve this and bypass that javascript. I elected to just use curl:

curl --user natas1:gtVrDuiDfck831PqWsLEZy5gyDz1clto  http://natas1.natas.labs.overthewire.org/

and I got the following source code:

“`html

natas1

You can find the password for the next level on this page, but rightclicking has been blocked!

“` Password: ZluruAthQk7Q2MqmDeTiUij2ZvWy2mBi

entry.title: Natas 0
entry.content:
Username: natas0
URL: http://natas0.natas.labs.overthewire.org

This challenge was fairly straight forward. All we need to do is view the page source and we can see in an HTML comment the password for level 1.

“`html

natas0

You can find the password for the next level on this page.

“`

Password: gtVrDuiDfck831PqWsLEZy5gyDz1clto
